Cheat.Description: Open your case and select and unselect the key-item in slot 1 to change it; they will loop.
Cheat.Text: [01][Special] Get Any Key/Item In Slot 1: (Un)Select It

Cheat.Description: Store a weapon and it will loop through all the possible weapons. No grenades. No Boot and Kitchen Knife. If 2 same weapons are stored, 1 dissapears.
Cheat.Text: [02][Special] Get Any Weapon: Store A New One

Cheat.Description: Turn [02] OFF. If you store a First Aid Spray in the case, you will get this weapon upgrade.
Cheat.Text: [03a][Special] Get High-power Scope: Store First Aid Spray
[03b][Special] Get Biosensor Scope: Store First Aid Spray
[03c][Special] Get Scope: Store First Aid Spray

Cheat.Description: Turn ON before loading. You will start the game with this weapon instead of the SG-09 R.

Better Turn it ON before loading the scene. Be careful in Chapter 1, when the rocks fall down. If you get under them, due to the immunity, you could cross the floor and fall forever. Load Autosave if this happened.
After shooting, the weapon will get the maximum number of bullets, that weapon has.
The quantity of ammunition will not decrease. That`s the difference with cheat 12.

If Cheat number 02 is OFF, turn this one ON in order to be able to store Saddler`s Scene Rocket Launcher. Otherwise, it will disappear. After defeating Saddler, it will disappear it does not matter what.
Cheat.Text: [19][Weapon] Rocket Launcher (Saddler One) Can Be Stored
[27][Interaction] Puzzles: No Need To Solve Them
[29][Interaction] Open Big Door In Chapter 2 Without Item

Cheat.Description: This one is really dangerous, NOT RECOMMENDED FOR FIRST PLAY. After opening some doors, you will get an animation. Some of these animations can be skipped. Others DON`T. That`s why I say it can be dangerous: you can get easily stuck (Load Autosave). If you know which ones you can skip, it can be fun, using this cheat. Or if you just want to experiment with it.

Cheat.Text: [33][Item] Most Keys Stay When Used (-Blue Dial)
[37][Total Play Time] Reset to Zero And Stopped

Cheat.Description: Actually it is slowed down. If I am right, every 277 hours of playing it will be 1 second so ... I would call that: Timer Stopped.

Cheats 43 to 47 will affect the end of the chapter. If you leave them ON while on Menu - Main Story - Results, it will affect ALL OF THE CHAPTERS; the info will be overwritten. If you do not want that to happen, turn them OFF.
If cheats 48 to 51 are ON, you do not need even to shoot once; you will get directly an S.
It will not allow you to continue if it`s ON in some situations where NMEs must come to you, like in the House Attack with Luis (Chapter 5) or the Crane with Ashley (Chapter 14).
Cheat.Text: [58][NME] Ganados Move Less - Cheat [59] Must Be OFF
